text:
The Java Request Sampler fields are not reset to the default when creating a 
second sampler.

This was fixed for other GUI elements when the clear() methods were split into 
clearGui() and clearData()
creator: sebb@apache.org

text:
Created attachment 27482
Implementation of clearGui in JavaTestSamplerGui and JavaConfigGui

Hello,
Bug scenario:
1) Create a Thread group
2) Add a Java Sampler and fill its data
3) Add a new one, all its values are taken from the previous

Other scenario:
1) Create a Thread group
2) Add a Java Sampler and fill its data
3) Remove it
4) Add a new one, its value are taken from deleted one

The patch fixes the issue.
Regards
Philippe Mouawad
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
